## Project Overview
A complete affiliate marketing system with Google authentication, click tracking, conversion webhooks, and Paystack payouts integration.

## Project Complete! âœ…

All features have been implemented and tested. The project builds successfully with no errors.

### Next Steps
1. Follow the [QUICKSTART.md](../QUICKSTART.md) guide to set up Supabase
2. Configure your environment variables in `.env.local`
3. Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
4. Follow the [TESTING.md](../TESTING.md) guide to test all features

### Key Files
- `README.md` - Complete documentation
- `QUICKSTART.md` - 5-minute setup guide
- `TESTING.md` - Testing guide with examples
- `supabase-schema.sql` - Database schema
- `.env.example` - Environment variables template
